<<'PATCH'
*** Begin Patch
*** Add File: d:\OneDrive\OLD\Documents\Persons\Mahmut_Tekin\personal-cv.html
+<!DOCTYPE html>
+<html lang="en">
+<head>
+    <meta charset="UTF-8">
+    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
+    <title>Personal CV</title>
+    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
+    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
+    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
+    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display:wght@700&family=Lato:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
+    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.0.0-beta3/css/all.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
+    <link href="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.css" rel="stylesheet">
+    <style>
+        body {
+            font-family: 'Lato', sans-serif;
+        }
+        h1, h2, h3 {
+            font-family: 'Playfair Display', serif;
+        }
+        .timeline-item:before {
+            content: '';
+            position: absolute;
+            left: -33px;
+            top: 4px;
+            width: 25px;
+            height: 25px;
+            border-radius: 50%;
+            background-color: #fff;
+            border: 4px solid #14B8A6;
+            transition: all 0.3s ease;
+        }
+        .timeline-item:hover:before {
+            background-color: #14B8A6;
+            transform: scale(1.1);
+        }
+    </style>
+    <meta name="description" content="Personal CV - replace placeholders with your details">
+</head>
+<body class="bg-slate-50 text-slate-700">
+
+    <div class="container mx-auto p-4 md:p-8 lg:p-12 max-w-6xl">
+        <!-- Header Section -->
+        <header class="flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center justify-between mb-16" data-aos="fade-down">
+            <div class="md:w-1/4 text-center mb-8 md:mb-0">
+                <img src="person.jpg" alt="Your Name" class="rounded-full w-48 h-48 mx-auto object-cover shadow-lg">
+            </div>
+            <div class="md:w-3/4 text-center md:text-left">
+                <h1 class="text-7xl font-bold bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-teal-500 to-cyan-600 pb-2">Your Name</h1>
+                <p class="mt-6 text-lg max-w-3xl mx-auto md:mx-0 text-slate-600">
+                    Brief professional summary goes here. Summarize your years of experience, domain expertise, and key strengths in 2-3 sentences.
+                </p>
+            </div>
+        </header>
+
+        <!-- Contact Section -->
+        <div class="bg-white shadow-xl rounded-xl p-6 mb-16 flex flex-wrap justify-center items-center gap-x-8 gap-y-4 ring-1 ring-slate-200" data-aos="fade-up">
+            <div class="flex items-center text-slate-600">
+                <i class="fas fa-phone-alt text-teal-500 mr-3"></i>
+                <span>+90 5XX XXX XX XX</span>
+            </div>
+            <div class="flex items-center text-slate-600">
+                <i class="fas fa-map-marker-alt text-teal-500 mr-3"></i>
+                <span>City / Country</span>
+            </div>
+            <div class="flex items-center text-slate-600">
+                <i class="fas fa-envelope text-teal-500 mr-3"></i>
+                <a href="mailto:your.email@example.com" class="hover:text-teal-600 transition-colors">your.email@example.com</a>
+            </div>
+            <div class="flex items-center text-slate-600">
+                <i class="fas fa-birthday-cake text-teal-500 mr-3"></i>
+                <span>Birth: YYYY</span>
+            </div>
+            <div class="flex items-center text-slate-600">
+                <i class="fas fa-flag text-teal-500 mr-3"></i>
+                <span>Nationality</span>
+            </div>
+        </div>
+
+        <div class="text-center mb-8">
+            <button id="download-pdf" class="bg-teal-500 hover:bg-teal-600 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded-lg shadow-lg transition-all duration-300">
+                <i class="fas fa-file-pdf mr-2"></i>Download as PDF
+            </button>
+        </div>
+
+        <!-- Main Content -->
+        <div class="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-16">
+            <!-- Left Column: Work Experience -->
+            <div class="lg:col-span-2">
+                <h2 class="text-5xl font-bold border-b-4 border-teal-500 pb-4 mb-12">Work Experience</h2>
+                <div class="relative pl-8 border-l-4 border-teal-100">
+                    
+                    <div class="timeline-item mb-12 bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-2xl hover:-translate-y-1" data-aos="fade-right">
+                        <h3 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-slate-800">Job Title</h3>
+                        <p class="text-md font-medium text-slate-500">Company Name</p>
+                        <p class="text-sm text-slate-400 mb-4">Start – End</p>
+                        <ul class="list-disc list-inside text-slate-600 space-y-2">
+                            <li>Key responsibility or achievement one.</li>
+                            <li>Key responsibility or achievement two.</li>
+                            <li>Key responsibility or achievement three.</li>
+                        </ul>
+                    </div>
+
+                    <div class="timeline-item mb-12 bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-2xl hover:-translate-y-1" data-aos="fade-right">
+                        <h3 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-slate-800">Job Title</h3>
+                        <p class="text-md font-medium text-slate-500">Company Name</p>
+                        <p class="text-sm text-slate-400 mb-4">Start – End</p>

+                            <li>Key responsibility or achievement one.</li>
+                            <li>Key responsibility or achievement two.</li>
+                            <li>Key responsibility or achievement three.</li>
+                        </ul>
+                    </div>
+
+                </div>
+            </div>
+
+            <!-- Right Column: Education, Skills, etc. -->
+            <div data-aos="fade-left">
+                <div class="bg-white shadow-xl rounded-xl p-8 mb-8 ring-1 ring-slate-200">
+                    <h2 class="text-3xl font-bold mb-6">Education</h2>
+                    <div class="mb-6 border-l-4 border-teal-200 pl-4">
+                        <h3 class="font-bold text-lg">Degree / Program</h3>
+                        <p class="text-slate-500">University / Institution</p>
+                        <p class="text-sm text-slate-400">Year – Year</p>
+                    </div>
+                    <div class="border-l-4 border-teal-200 pl-4">
+                        <h3 class="font-bold text-lg">Degree / Program</h3>
+                        <p class="text-slate-500">University / Institution</p>
+                        <p class="text-sm text-slate-400">Year – Year</p>
+                    </div>
+                </div>
+
+                <div class="bg-white shadow-xl rounded-xl p-8 mb-8 ring-1 ring-slate-200">
+                    <h2 class="text-3xl font-bold mb-6">Languages</h2>
+                    <p class="text-lg"><span class="font-bold">Language 1:</span> Level</p>
+                    <p class="text-lg"><span class="font-bold">Language 2:</span> Level</p>
+                </div>
+
+                <div class="bg-white shadow-xl rounded-xl p-8 mb-8 ring-1 ring-slate-200">
+                    <h2 class="text-3xl font-bold mb-6">Certificates & Training</h2>
+                    <ul class="list-none space-y-3">
+                        <li class="flex items-center"><i class="fas fa-award text-teal-500 mr-3"></i>Certificate or Training 1</li>
+                        <li class="flex items-center"><i class="fas fa-award text-teal-500 mr-3"></i>Certificate or Training 2</li>
+                        <li class="flex items-center"><i class="fas fa-award text-teal-500 mr-3"></i>Certificate or Training 3</li>
+                    </ul>
+                </div>
+            </div>
+        </div>
+        
+        <footer class="text-center mt-20 text-slate-400">
+            <p>Generated by AI | Styled with Tailwind CSS</p>
+        </footer>
+
+    </div>
+    <script src="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.js"></script>
+    <script>
+        AOS.init({
+            duration: 800,
+            once: true,
+        });
+    </script>
+    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/html2pdf.js/0.10.1/html2pdf.bundle.min.js"></script>
+    <script>
+        document.getElementById('download-pdf').addEventListener('click', function () {
+            const element = document.querySelector('.container');
+            const nameSafe = (document.querySelector('h1')?.textContent || 'Personal_CV').trim().replace(/\s+/g, '_');
+            const opt = {
+                margin:       0.5,
+                filename:     nameSafe + '_CV.pdf',
+                image:        { type: 'jpeg', quality: 0.98 },
+                html2canvas:  { scale: 2, useCORS: true },
+                jsPDF:        { unit: 'in', format: 'letter', orientation: 'portrait' }
+            };
+            html2pdf().set(opt).from(element).save();
+        });
+    </script>
+</body>
+</html>
*** End Patch
PATCH
```
